verses.name: Judges 5:20
verses.text: They fought from heaven; the stars in their courses fought against Sisera.

verses.name: Judges 5:21
verses.text: The river of Kishon swept them away, that ancient river, the river Kishon. O my soul, thou hast trodden down strength.

verses.name: Judges 5:22
verses.text: Then were the horsehoofs broken by the means of the pransings, the pransings of their mighty ones.

verses.name: Judges 5:23
verses.text: Curse ye Meroz, said the angel of the Lord, curse ye bitterly the inhabitants thereof; because they came not to the help of the Lord, to the help of the Lord against the mighty.
